cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl
类 ImageMemoryCache

java.lang.Object
  cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.SimpleCache<K,V>
      cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.PreloadDataCache<java.lang.String,Bitmap>
          cn.trinea.android.common.service.impl.ImageMemoryCache
所有已实现的接口：
Cache<java.lang.String,Bitmap>, java.io.Serializable
直接已知子类：
ImageCache
public class ImageMemoryCache
extends PreloadDataCache<java.lang.String,Bitmap>

Image Memory Cache

It applies to images those uesd frequently, like users avatar of twitter or sina weibo. Cache of big image you can consider of ImageSDCardCache.

    Setting and Usage
  • Use one of constructors in sections II to init cache
  • setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener) set callback interface when getting image
  • get(String, List, View) get image asynchronous and preload other images asynchronous according to urlList
  • get(String, View) get image asynchronous
  • setHttpReadTimeOut(int) set http read image time out, if less than 0, not set. default is not set
  • PreloadDataCache.setContext(Context) and PreloadDataCache.setAllowedNetworkTypes(int) restrict the types of networks over which this data can get.
  • setOpenWaitingQueue(boolean) set whether open waiting queue, default is true. If true, save all view waiting for image loaded, else only save the newest one
  • PreloadDataCache.setOnGetDataListener(OnGetDataListener) set how to get image, this cache will get image and preload images by it
  • SimpleCache.setCacheFullRemoveType(CacheFullRemoveType) set remove type when cache is full
  • other see PreloadDataCache and SimpleCache
    Constructor
  • ImageMemoryCache()
  • ImageMemoryCache(int)
  • ImageMemoryCache(int, int)
    Attentions
  • You should add android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE in manifest if you get image from network.

另请参见：

字段详细信息

DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE

public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE
recommend default max cache size according to dalvik max memory

构造方法详细信息

ImageMemoryCache

public ImageMemoryCache()
  • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
  • callback interface when getting image is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
  • Maximum size of the cache is DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full

另请参见：
PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache()

ImageMemoryCache

public ImageMemoryCache(int maxSize)
  • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
  • callback interface when getting image is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full

参数：
maxSize - maximum size of the cache
另请参见：
PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache(int)

ImageMemoryCache

public ImageMemoryCache(int maxSize,
                        int threadPoolSize)
  • Get data listener is getDefaultOnGetImageListener()
  • callback interface when getting image is null, can set by setOnImageCallbackListener(OnImageCallbackListener)
  • Elements of the cache will not invalid
  • Remove type is RemoveTypeUsedCountSmall when cache is full

参数：
maxSize - maximum size of the cache
threadPoolSize - getting data thread pool size
另请参见：
PreloadDataCache.PreloadDataCache(int, int)
方法详细信息

get

public boolean get(java.lang.String imageUrl,
                   View view)
get image asynchronous. when get image success, it will pass to ImageMemoryCache.OnImageCallbackListener.onGetSuccess(String, Bitmap, View, boolean)

参数：
imageUrl -
view -
返回：
whether image already in cache or not

get

public boolean get(java.lang.String imageUrl,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> urlList,
                   View view)
get image asynchronous and preload other images asynchronous according to urlList

参数：
imageUrl -
urlList - url list, if is null, not preload, else preload forward by PreloadDataCache.preloadDataForward(Object, List, int), preload backward by PreloadDataCache.preloadDataBackward(Object, List, int)
view -
返回：
whether image already in cache or not

getHttpReadTimeOut

public int getHttpReadTimeOut()

返回：
the httpReadTimeOut

setHttpReadTimeOut

public void setHttpReadTimeOut(int readTimeOutMillis)
set http read image time out, if less than 0, not set. default is not set, in mills

参数：
readTimeOutMillis -

isOpenWaitingQueue

public boolean isOpenWaitingQueue()
get whether open waiting queue, default is true. If true, save all view waiting for image loaded, else only save the newest one

setRequestProperties

public void setRequestProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestProperties)
set http request properties
  • If image is from the different server, setRequestProperty("Connection", "false") is recommended. If image is from the same server, true is recommended, and this is the default value

参数：
requestProperties -
